name: Half-Day Fishing Trips in the Whitsundays
description: Embark on a half-day fishing adventure in the breathtaking Whitsundays, where the vibrant fishing grounds promise an unforgettable experience. Perfect for both seasoned anglers and first-timers, this tour offers a mix of relaxation and excitement. With expert guidance and high-quality fishing gear provided, you'll have the best chance to reel in species like Giant Trevally, Queen Fish, and Coral Trout. Enjoy the friendly and welcoming atmosphere on board, making it an ideal choice for families and groups seeking a memorable day on the water.
includes:
High-Quality Fishing Gear: Rods, reels, and tackle provided
Expert Guidance from experienced crew
Refreshments On Board: Light snacks and drinks
Scenic Locations: Explore vibrant fishing grounds
Friendly Atmosphere
highlights:
Fun and relaxation on the water
Opportunities to catch Giant Trevally, Queen Fish, and Coral Trout
Catered to all skill levels
Available in the morning or afternoon
Friendly and experienced crew
ideal_for: Families, groups, and fishing enthusiasts of all skill levels

name: Fish Feeding & Snorkelling in the Whitsundays
description: Discover the underwater wonders of the Whitsundays with an unforgettable snorkelling and fish feeding experience. Perfect for both seasoned snorkellers and beginners, this tour offers a relaxed and laid-back atmosphere as you explore vibrant coral reefs and crystal-clear waters. Get up close with tropical marine life and enjoy the unique opportunity to feed them, creating lasting memories. Whether you choose a half-day or full-day adventure, you'll enjoy seamless access to prime snorkelling spots and the safety of stinger suits during the warmer months.
departure_location: Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach, QLD
includes:
Half-day and full-day tour options
Tender boat access to snorkelling spots
Stinger suits for safety
Fish feeding experience
highlights:
Explore stunning island locations
Experience vibrant marine life
Safe and easy snorkelling access
Relaxed and informative tours
Meet marine life up close
ideal_for: Couples, families, and adventure seekers looking to explore the marine life of the Whitsundays.
